title: March is Womenâ€™s History Month!
author: VD
content_html:
My, I have been remiss. Do allow me to attempt to amend matters:

On this day in 1901, Annie Edson Taylor, a schoolteacher from Michigan, becomes the first person to go over Niagara Falls in a barrel. Her husband is arrested and charged with attempted murder later that afternoon.
content_text:
My, I have been remiss.  Do allow me to attempt to amend matters:
On this day in 1901, Annie Edson Taylor, a schoolteacher from Michigan, becomes the first person to go over Niagara Falls in a barrel.  Her husband is arrested and charged with attempted murder later that afternoon.
